ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Absorption model with power law dependence on energy. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: Absorption as a power law in energy. Useful for things like dust.
This is a multiplicative model component.
This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.
